DOC.brief_title: Effects Fish-oil Mood Cognitive Functions Healthy Individuals
DOC.criteria: Dutchspeaking men woman Normal weight ( BMI 18 27 ) . Regular diet , contain fish week . History depression ( least one major depressive episode past ) . Currently mildly depress ( BDIIINL score high 19 , score suicidality item scale high 1 ) . Current past psychosis Current substance abuse past substance dependence Smoking current use soft drug ( current = month prior study till completion ) Any hard drug use ( lifetime ) More 3 alcoholic consumptions/day Participants ask keep dietary habit constant throughout study .
